places.reported: Reported a mistake on the place
places.canceled_reports: Canceled the reports on the place

lost_password.explanation: Enter your address and we'll send you a link right away to reset your password.

reset_password.explanation: Choose a new password for this account.

errors.you_need_an_account: You must be logged in to do this
errors.this_picture_format_is_not_accepted: This image format is not accepted
errors.picture_too_big: This image exceeds the max size of
errors.you_cannot_do_that: You are authorized to do this
errors.already_stepped_for_delete: You have already reported this place
errors.you_are_already_present: You have already indicated your presence, you can cancel on your profile

information.spots_private_land: For private land, don't forget to indicate the owner's contact details so that users can contact him / her. Add this information only with the consent of the person in question.

login_form.email_not_valid: Your email format is not valid
login_form.no_email_creation_account: You can create an account without an email address if you want to remain anonymous. But if you forget your password, it will be impossible to recover it

map.new_place_tooltip: Click to create a new place

place.no_connection_for_nomads: You cannot access this info in Offline mode
place.how_long: How long do you want to appear here ?
place.presence_created: Your presence will be indicated for
place.email_sender_label: Write your email to contact them
place.email_sender_placeholder: Introduce yourself and provide your contact details
place.account_for_nomads: You must be logged in to an account to use this feature

place_deletion.cancel_success: Reports on this place has been canceled
place_deletion.your_creation: You created this place, so you can delete it all at once
place_deletion.explanation: You can report an error to the community to remove this place if other users confirm that this place needs to be removed.
place_deletion.type: Each type of place has a number of reports required before automatic deletion, you can see that below. If you only see one box, a single report automatically deletes the place.

place_form.edit_place_explaination: You are going to modify a place. Be sure to check your info, this is a community card. There is no administrator to check your data
place_form.new_place_explaination: You are about to add a new location. Everyone has the freedom to add, edit, and view places added by the community.
place_form.place_address_placeholder: Enter the address of the place
place_form.place_description_placeholder: Describe this place in a few words
place_form.private: This info will not be displayed publicly, a module will allow users to send an email

profile.not_yet: Nothing for the moment in the profile except your presence if you indicated it. Do not hesitate to contact us on Telegram if you have ideas for this page
profile.change_avatar: You can change your avatar by clicking on it.
profile.cache_removed: The locations stored in the device have been erased.
profile.presence_on_a_place: You signaled your presence on a place
profile.delete_explain: This action removes your account from our database. It is irreversible and it is impossible to recover the data.

system.you_need_an_account: You must be logged in to perform this action
system.updated: The website has been updated, refresh the page to see what's new :)
system.share_app: Download the Android App for La Carto'Nomades and join the community.

category_menu.offline_info: Filters are disabled when you are in Offline mode. Finds from the network or deactivates offline mode.

help.the_plus: The thing that make the difference
help.the_plus_text: This app is built with a special technology that allow us to update it whenever we update the website without going through the AppStore. When it happens, you can experience a quick flah or refresh of the app.
help.nomadics_text: This feature allows you to see if nomads have indicated their position on a place. The locations appear for the moment without zone restrictions, that may change. It's in test :)
help.filters_text: Filters are used to display more or less types of places depending on what you want. It is possible that the certe slows down a bit when it displays all the categories at the same time.
help.refresh_text: This button is used to search the places according to the selected filters on a circle of 30 km around the center of the screen.
help.offline_text: This mod comes in handy when going to a place without a network. Every place you open in the app is saved in the phone / browser. Suddenly, as soon as you no longer receive or activate the mode, the map displays all these places without zone restriction.
help.gps_text: The location has two modes. Tracking tracking, when there is a point in the middle of the icon, or single tracking when the point is not present. It is possible to switch between them by pressing the button.

welcome.title: Welcome to the guided tour
welcome.text: Because we would like to show you how to benefit the most of La Carto'Nomades, we thought it would a good idea to make this tour with you.

end.title: End of the tour
end.text: There is other features in this app. They are pretty easy to find once your created your account. If you have any other questons, don't hesitate to come on the Telegram channel
